name: SpinoffSubtitles
description: Adds spinoff subtexts to the main menu.

subtext-lite.name: Lite Subtext
subtext-lite.description: Enables the "Lite" subtext, as seen in GD Lite.

subtext-meltdown.name: Meltdown Subtext
subtext-meltdown.description: Enables the "Meltdown" subtext, as seen in GD Meltdown.

subtext-world.name: World Subtext
subtext-world.description: Enables the "World" subtext, as seen in GD World.

subtext-subzero.name: SubZero Subtext
subtext-subzero.description: Enables the "SubZero" subtext, as seen in GD SubZero.

subtext-2point2.name: 2.2 Subtext
subtext-2point2.description: Enables the "2.2" subtext, as seen in the GD 2.2 trailer.
